item.title: Daisy Ridley, Ambika Mod, Morfydd Clark Set for ‘Pride and Prejudice’ Table Read in Aid of Gaza
item.description: Ambika Mod, Daisy Ridley and Morfydd Clark are among the names taking part in a special one-off table read of “Pride and Prejudice” in London to raise money for Medical Aid for Palestinian
